channel.title: Sports on Braden Robinson's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Braden Robinson's GitHub Site

item.title: Salvador Perez's Oustanding Year
item.description: Salvador Perez had the best season he’s ever had in 2021. With an injury putting him out for the 2019 season and only playing 37 out of the 60 scheduled in 2020, Perez was as fresh as ever coming into the 2021 season and it showed. He was voted for his seventh all-star game and captured his fifth gold glove, along with these awards Perez broke the record for most home runs by a catcher in a single season with 48.

item.title: Nebraska Baseball 2020-2021
item.description: At the beginning of the 2021 baseball season Nebraska was looking to come out firing on all cylinders for Will Bolt’s first full season as the head coach for the Huskers, after the 2020 season was cut short due to COVID-19 striking the nation. The Huskers had previously made it to the Big Ten championship in 2019 only to lose to a talented Ohio State team, and continue on to lose out of the regional at Oklahoma State.
